items.text: Waiting for payday with fingers crossed

solution.title: As simple as advancing your pay
solution.description: Your salary arrives in 10 days, but the expense is now. We advance you a portion, you repay when you receive your salary. No stress, no overdraft.

features.title: Skip the overdraft
features.description: Bank overdrafts are among the most expensive credit. Our advance costs less.

features.title: Automatic repayment
features.description: When salary arrives, repayment happens. No installment to manage.

features.title: Minimal risk
features.description: Based on your upcoming salary, not a long-term loan. Simple and controlled.

features.title: Ultra-fast process
features.description: Apply in 2 minutes, funds available in hours.

features.title: No long commitment
features.description: A few days or weeks maximum. No loan that drags on.

features.title: Transparent
features.description: You know exactly what you repay. No hidden fees.

features.title: Discreet
features.description: Your employer is not contacted. It's between you and us.

features.title: Repeatable
features.description: Regular need? Possibility to renew if everything goes well.

profiles.title: Tight end of month

profiles.title: Urgent bill
